comment.text: LdapUserFilter is a filter field used to set conditions for LDAP user authentication. It appears on the Connection Settings page and allows users to define specific filters for LDAP users.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "تصفية المستخدم" is a literal translation of "User Filter", it's not the most natural or commonly used phrasing in Arabic for this context. It sounds slightly technical and not user-friendly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "مرشح المستخدم" (Mursih Al-Mustakhdim) which translates to 'User Selection/Filter' and is more common and understandable in a user interface context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Օգտատիրոջ զտիչ' while technically meaning 'User Filter', doesn't quite capture the nuance and common usage of 'User Filter' in technical contexts. It sounds overly formal and potentially confusing to Armenian speakers familiar with LDAP.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Օգտատերմիչ' or 'Օգտագործողի զտիչ'. The best choice will depend on the specific LDAP implementation and the intended audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ຕົວປ່ຽນແກ້ໄຂຜູ້ໃຊ້" (tua bpien kae phu sai) literally translates to 'User Editor'. While it might be understandable, 'User Filter' implies a filtering mechanism, not an editor. A more accurate translation would convey the concept of filtering or selection.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Possible alternatives include: 'ຕົວປ່ຽນແກ້ງຜູ້ໃຊ້' (tua bpien kaeng phu sai) - User Sifter/Filter, or 'ຕົວເລືອກຜູ້ໃຊ້' (tua leuak phu sai) - User Selection.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "පරිශීලක පෙරහන" (parishīlaka perahana) is a possible translation, a more common and accurate translation of "User Filter" in a technical context like LDAP would be "භාවිතාකරන්නන් පෙරහන" (bhavitakarañña perahana) or "කාර්යමණ්ඩල පෙරහන" (karmyānda perahana). "පරිශීලක" (parishīlaka) usually refers to a hobbyist or enthusiast, not a user in a technical setting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "පරිශීලක පෙරහන" with "භාවිතාකරන්නන් පෙරහන" or "කාර්යමණ්ඩල පෙරහන".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Bộ lọc Người dùng" is understandable, a more accurate and common translation of 'User Filter' in a technical context would be "Lọc người dùng". 'Bộ lọc' implies a collection of filters, whereas 'User Filter' typically refers to a single filter.
